units.name: Insight
units.prompt: Use scan to reveal enemy prompts and cloaked units. Stay at max range (â‰¤4 tiles for scan). Use recalibrate on wounded allies to buff them. Keep distance from enemies and avoid adjacent vectors.

units.name: Pulse
units.prompt: Keep your frontliner alive with patch. Stay behind them for cover. Overclock your striker or specter when no healing is needed.

units.name: Lattice
units.prompt: Trap the paths enemies must take to reach your backline. Stay at medium range. Use pulse on clustered enemies. Denial blocks adjacent threats.

player.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.

units.name: Shade
units.prompt: Stay cloaked and flank. Prioritize assassinating the enemy damage dealer. Use breach on sentinels to break their defensive posture. Recloak whenever it drops.

units.name: Marksman
units.prompt: Position for clear sight lines. Prioritize killing wounded enemies with precision_shot. If forced to move, retreat away from threats. Suppressing_fire to slow rushers.

units.name: Lifeline
units.prompt: Stay adjacent to the most threatened ally. Use patch on the most wounded teammate. If all healthy, use overclock on your damage dealer.

opponent.placementPrompt: Place the tankiest unit center front. Ranged units in the back. Flankers on the edges.
